attributes.action: MPs should work 1 week p.a. with nurses & 1 with a pensioners charity
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government to encourage all MPs to work 1 week p.a. with nurses and 1 week p.a. with a pensioners charity.

I think it is important for MPs to do this because health and pensions represent a large % of government spending and MPs ought to get out on the front line of each to see what the issues are.
